Reviews.Title: Purchase of Kodak Digital Bundle (Camera & Printer)
Reviews.Author: Louise Renaud
Reviews.Content: Digital Camera & Printer Bundle- Kodak5 star rating. Product arrived as scheduled and as specified. Gift was a great success and easy to set up, use and recipient was thrilled. I was happy to see that the service, product, and description matched and would reccomend it to all.

Reviews.Title: Good Stuff!
Reviews.Author: Dave E. Schnuckel
Reviews.Content: Had a very specialized project for this product and it worked flawlessly!  Needed portability and at-the-moment printing.  No issues.  The docking was simple and the prints were better than expected.  Wasn't real happy with the battery life of the camera, though.  Glad I bought extra batteries and a charger.Dave

Reviews.Title: Never Worked Properly
Reviews.Author: Tracy Styring
Reviews.Content: Tried to loaded print cartigage would not load properly, and never worked, Camera worked fine. no wonder Kodak stopped making this model

Reviews.Title: biggest pain in my butt!
Reviews.Author: hsmorrison
Reviews.Content: the first use the paper got jammed, wouldn't come out and when i had to forcefully remove it, the warranty was invalid, SO i paid another $90 to fix the stupid thing and the ink runs out really fast and now the feeder never works. I have to maually feed each picture! But it does have nice picture quality. UGH!

Reviews.Title: Undelivery Items
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Kemp
Reviews.Content: I ordered the above item on June 4, 2009. They promise I would get the item no latter then June 26, 2009. Until this day (July 5, 2009) I have not received my item.  I contact seller serveral time.  I got no response. I will never again order from this company again after dealing with them so long. This is the first experience of this happen. I need this camera for cruise and a wedding. What a let down.

Create stunning quality prints with 6.2 MP
Get closer to your subjects and see the details with a 3X optical zoom lens
Lab quality, real KODAK Pictures in 60 seconds with one touch
Get better, brighter pictures and red-eye reduction with automatic KODAK PERFECT TOUCH Technology
Real KODAK Pictures¿everything you need to capture, print, and share in seconds
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak Easyshare C613 6.2 MP Digital Camera with 3xOptical Zoom with G610 Printer Dock Bundle
